abstract: The greatest banking turmoil is setting in around Citigroup, which has lost half its value in four days.
snippet: The greatest banking turmoil is setting in around Citigroup, which has lost half its value in four days.
lead_paragraph: For months, the nation’s largest banks have struggled to regain investors’ trust. In the center of the vortex is Citigroup, whose precipitous stock-market plunge accelerated on Thursday, sending shock waves through the financial world.

headline.main: Citigroup Tries to Stop the Drop in Its Share Price
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Leads the Way as Financial Stocks Go Into Freefall

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Louise Story
